page.title: 03HOUSING IN NEWPORT
page.content: The council owns over 15,500 homes spread throughout the borough. In recent years the emphasis has been on improving the older communities. During the years of 1971 and 1979 Pontfaen and Broadmead Park were built. There are many estates in Newport. For example, Somerton estate which has undergone substantial repair. There are 14 sheltered complexes comprising of flats, bedsitting rooms and bungalows with a residenial warden. Newport can offer every type of home from the small terraced house to the large semi-detached house. The prices of homes in Newport average, and no homes in Newport borough are far from open space, schools, shops and other community facilities.
